alert.note: Alert for Carter; Garvin; Jefferson; Murray; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:20AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, southern Garvin, southeastern Stephens, Carter and western Murray Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Katie to near Graham to 4 miles northeast of Grady. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Davis, Lone Grove, Healdton, Wynnewood, Wilson, Ringling, Springer, Elmore City, Katie, Foster, Tatums, Ratliff City, Graham, Pooleville, Turner Falls, Hennepin, Milo, Cornish, and Fox. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 31 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
